channel.title: Directors on HoneyTrap
channel.description: Recent content in Directors on HoneyTrap

item.title: Forward
item.description: Description The forward director will forward traffic to a remote host. Syntax [director.forward] type="forward" Arguments in config file There is 1 argument in forward director: argument default setting explanation host none Set the ip address of the remote host Example If you want to override the destination port, you can use precise the port, where all forwarded traffic will be directed to this port.

item.title: LXC Container
item.description: Description The lxc director will spawn a container per attacker. After a period of inactivity, the container will be frozen and eventually stopped. When the attacker returns, the original container will be assigned to his session. Syntax [director.lxc] type="lxc" Arguments in config file There is 3 argument in forward director: argument default setting explanation freeze_every 15 min Set the ip address of the remote host.
